projects.title: Online Store
projects.description: A website where you can shop for items, add to cart and checkout. There was a probelm displaying multiple items of the same type to cart. The solution was creating a function that if the item was already on the list to just add the quantity property. I made this project to better understand components and how to make them work together. The use of global context or redux would be an improvement to prevent prop drilling.

projects.title: Scool Parent App
projects.description: A user is able to fill out form with certain requirements. They are also able to edit their form. A teacher is a ble to view all forms. A fullstack application using React.js, node.js and mySql.

projects.title: Lift Notes
projects.description: A user is able to keep track if his performance in the weight room.
